thread.title: WPX Energy Declares Dividend on Preferred Stock

author: cnbc.com
title: WPX Energy Declares Dividend on Preferred Stock
text:
TULSA, Okla.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- WPX Energy’s (NYSE: WPX) board of directors has approved a quarterly dividend of $0.78125 per share to holders of the company’s 6.25 percent Series A Mandatory Convertible Preferred Stock. The dividend is payable as of April 30, 2018, to holders of record of the company’s preferred stock on April 13, 2018.
About WPX Energy, Inc.
WPX is an independent energy producer with core positions in the Permian and Williston basins. WPX’s production is approximately 80 percent oil/liquids and 20 percent natural gas. The company also has an emerging infrastructure portfolio in the Permian Basin. Visit www.wpxenergy.com for more information.
